system.description:
Your mind palace is like a universe unto itself. “Brilliance” doesn’t begin to cover it. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence increases by +1, to a maximum of 20. If it is already 20, you may increase your Wisdom or Charisma by +1 instead, also to a maximum of 20.
  • You gain proficiency with two additional languages of your choice.
  • You learn the third Scholarly Excellence option.
  • You may cast any spell from a spell scroll with the following limitations:
    • If the spell is not on the Wizard list, the level of the spell must be of a level you can cast.
    • When you cast a spell that is not on the Wizard list, you must make an Intelligence save with a DC equal to 10+ the spell level. On a failure, you still cast the spell, but suffer a level of strife.
